abstract: We prove a dimension-free stability result for polydisc slicing due to Oleszkiewicz and Pelczy≈Ñski (2000). Intriguingly, compared to the real case, there is an additional asymptotic maximiser. In addition to Fourier-analytic bounds, we crucially rely on a self-improving feature of polydisc slicing, established via probabilistic arguments.
publication_venue: Final version. To appear in Mathematika
